title: U.S. Christmas lights energy costs
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories for the x axis representing Lighting Type, and a y axis representing Energy cost in U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at Standard_incandescent_lights_(125_lights_4_watts_each) where Energy cost in U.S. dollars is 27.21.
The lowest category is found at LED_lights_(280_lights_0.04_watts_each) where Energy cost in U.S. dollars is 0.06.

data.Lighting Type: Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each)
